verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi reached הַגּוֹרָ֗ל <S%H1486><s%> hag-go-Ral, [This] then was the lot לְמַטֵּ֛ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh of the tribe בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam; by their families אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about גְּב֨וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul [even] to the border אֱד֧וֹם <S%H123><s%> e-Dom of Edom מִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> mid-bar- the wilderness צִ֛ן <S%H6790><s%> tzin of Zin נֶ֖גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> Neg-bah southward מִקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> mik-Tzeh [was] the uttermost part תֵימָֽן׃ <S%H8486><s%> tei-Man. of the south coast

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem like גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul border נֶ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> Ne-gev, And their south מִקְצֵ֖ה <S%H7097><s%> mik-Tzeh was from the shore יָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> yam sea הַמֶּ֑לַח <S%H4417><s%> ham-Me-lach; of the salt מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַלָּשֹׁ֖ן <S%H3956><s%> hal-la-Shon from the bay הַפֹּנֶ֥ה <S%H6437><s%> hap-po-Neh that looketh נֶֽגְבָּה׃ <S%H5045><s%> Neg-bah. southward

וְ֠יָצָא <S%H3318><s%> Ve-ya-tza And it went out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מִנֶּ֜גֶב <S%H5045><s%> min-Ne-gev to the south side לְמַעֲלֵ֤ה le-ma-'a-Leh עַקְרַבִּים֙ <S%H4610><s%> 'ak-rab-Bim to Maalehacrabbim וְעָ֣בַר <S%H5674><s%> ve-'A-var and passed צִ֔נָה <S%H6790><s%> Tzi-nah, along to Zin וְעָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lah and ascended up מִנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> min-Ne-gev on the south side לְקָדֵ֣שׁ le-ka-Desh בַּרְנֵ֑עַ <S%H6947><s%> bar-Ne-a'; unto Kadeshbarnea וְעָבַ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> ve-'a-Var and passed חֶצְרוֹן֙ <S%H2696><s%> chetz-rOn along to Hezron וְעָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lah and went up אַדָּ֔רָה <S%H146><s%> 'ad-Da-rah, to Adar וְנָסַ֖ב <S%H5437><s%> ve-na-Sav and fetched a compass הַקַּרְקָֽעָה׃ <S%H7173><s%> hak-kar-Ka-'ah. to Karkaa

וְעָבַ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> ve-'a-Var [From thence] it passed עַצְמ֗וֹנָה <S%H6111><s%> atz-Mo-nah, toward Azmon וְיָצָא֙ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza and went out נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> Na-chal unto the river מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt; וְהָיָה ve-ha-yah כוְהָי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become קתֹּצְא֥וֹת <S%H8444><s%> to-tze-'ot and the goings out הַגְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul of that coast יָ֑מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah; were at the sea זֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> zeh- This יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul coast נֶֽגֶב׃ <S%H5045><s%> Ne-gev. this shall be your south

וּגְב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> u-ge-Vul border קֵ֙דְמָה֙ <S%H6924><s%> ke-de-mah And the east יָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> yam sea הַמֶּ֔לַח <S%H4417><s%> ham-Me-lach, [was] the salt עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far קְצֵ֖ה <S%H7097><s%> ke-Tzeh [even] unto the end הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den; of Jordan וּגְב֞וּל <S%H1366><s%> u-ge-Vul And [their] border לִפְאַ֤ת <S%H6285><s%> lif-'At quarter צָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah in the north מִלְּשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> mil-le-Shon [was] from the bay הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam, of the sea מִקְצֵ֖ה <S%H7097><s%> mik-Tzeh at the uttermost part הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den. of Jordan

וְעָלָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lah went up הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And the border בֵּ֣ית beit חָגְלָ֔ה <S%H1031><s%> cha-ge-Lah, to Bethhogla וְעָבַ֕ר <S%H5674><s%> ve-'a-Var and passed מִצְּפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> mitz-tze-Fon along by the north לְבֵ֣ית le-Veit הָעֲרָבָ֑ה <S%H1026><s%> ha-'a-ra-Vah; of Betharabah וְעָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lah went up הַגְּב֔וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul, and the border אֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> 'E-ven to the stone בֹּ֖הַן <S%H932><s%> Bo-han of Bohan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven. of Reuben

וְעָלָ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lah went up הַגְּב֥וּל׀ <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And the border דְּבִרָה֮ <S%H1688><s%> de-vi-Rah toward Debir מֵעֵ֣מֶק <S%H6010><s%> me-'E-mek from the valley עָכוֹר֒ <S%H5911><s%> 'a-chOr of Achor וְצָפ֜וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> ve-tza-Fo-nah and so northward פֹּנֶ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> po-Neh looking אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward הַגִּלְגָּ֗ל <S%H1537><s%> hag-gil-Gal, toward Gilgal אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נֹ֙כַח֙ <S%H5227><s%> no-chach that [is] before לְמַעֲלֵ֣ה <S%H4608><s%> le-ma-'a-Leh the going up אֲדֻמִּ֔ים <S%H131><s%> 'a-dum-Mim, to Adummim אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מִנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> min-Ne-gev which [is] on the south side לַנָּ֑חַל <S%H5158><s%> lan-Na-chal; of the river וְעָבַ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> ve-'a-Var passed הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul and the border אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward מֵי־ <S%H4325><s%> mei- toward the waters עֵ֣ין 'ein שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H5885><s%> She-mesh, of Enshemesh וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu and the goings תֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <S%H8444><s%> to-tze-'o-Tav and the goings out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward עֵ֥ין 'ein רֹגֵֽל׃ <S%H5883><s%> ro-Gel. thereof were at Enrogel

וְעָלָ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lah went up הַגְּב֜וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And the border גֵּ֣י <S%H1516><s%> gei by the valley בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- of the son הִנֹּ֗ם <S%H2011><s%> hin-Nom, of Hinnom אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כֶּ֤תֶף <S%H3802><s%> Ke-tef side הַיְבוּסִי֙ <S%H2983><s%> hay-vu-Si of the Jebusite מִנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> min-Ne-gev, unto the south הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim; the same [is] Jerusalem וְעָלָ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lah went up הַגְּב֜וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul and the border אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh to the top הָהָ֗ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har, of the mountain אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- that פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei that [lieth] before גֵֽי־ <S%H1516><s%> gei- the valley הִנֹּם֙ <S%H2011><s%> hin-Nom of Hinnom יָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah, westward אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בִּקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> bik-Tzeh which [is] at the end עֵֽמֶק־ <S%H6010><s%> 'e-mek- of the valley רְפָאִ֖ים <S%H7497><s%> re-fa-'Im of the giants צָפֹֽנָה׃ <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah. northward

וְתָאַ֨ר <S%H8388><s%> ve-ta-'Ar was drawn הַגְּב֜וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And the border מֵרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> me-Rosh from the top הָהָ֗ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har, of the hill אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מַעְיַן֙ <S%H4599><s%> ma'-Yan unto the fountain מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> mei of the water נֶפְתּ֔וֹחַ <S%H5318><s%> nef-To-ach, of Nephtoah וְיָצָ֖א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza and went out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei to the cities הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- of mount עֶפְר֑וֹן <S%H6085><s%> ef-Ron; Ephron וְתָאַ֤ר <S%H8388><s%> ve-ta-'Ar was drawn הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul and the border בַּעֲלָ֔ה <S%H1173><s%> ba-'a-Lah, to Baalah הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he קִרְיַ֥ת kir-Yat יְעָרִֽים׃ <S%H7157><s%> ye-'a-Rim. which [is] Kirjathjearim

וְנָסַב֩ <S%H5437><s%> ve-na-Sav compassed הַגְּב֨וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And the border מִבַּעֲלָ֥ה <S%H1173><s%> mib-ba-'a-Lah from Baalah יָ֙מָּה֙ <S%H3220><s%> yam-mah westward אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> har unto mount שֵׂעִ֔יר <S%H8165><s%> se-'Ir, Seir וְעָבַ֕ר <S%H5674><s%> ve-'a-Var and passed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כֶּ֧תֶף <S%H3802><s%> Ke-tef along unto the side הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- of mount יְעָרִ֛ים <S%H3297><s%> ye-'a-Rim Jearim מִצָּפ֖וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> mitz-tza-Fo-nah on the north side הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he כְסָל֑וֹן <S%H3693><s%> che-sa-Lon; which [is] Chesalon וְיָרַ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> ve-ya-Rad and went down בֵּֽית־ beit- שֶׁ֖מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> She-mesh to Bethshemesh וְעָבַ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> ve-'a-Var and passed on תִּמְנָֽה׃ <S%H8553><s%> tim-Nah. to Timnah

וְיָצָ֨א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza went out הַגְּב֜וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And the border אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כֶּ֣תֶף <S%H3802><s%> Ke-tef unto the side עֶקְרוֹן֮ <S%H6138><s%> 'ek-rOn of Ekron צָפוֹנָה֒ <S%H6828><s%> tza-fo-Nah northward וְתָאַ֤ר <S%H8388><s%> ve-ta-'Ar was drawn הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul and the border שִׁכְּר֔וֹנָה <S%H7942><s%> shik-ke-Ro-nah, to Shicron וְעָבַ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> ve-'a-Var and passed along הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- to mount הַֽבַּעֲלָ֖ה <S%H1173><s%> hab-ba-'a-Lah Baalah וְיָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza and went out יַבְנְאֵ֑ל <S%H2995><s%> yav-ne-'El; unto Jabneel וְהָי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu and the goings תֹּצְא֥וֹת <S%H8444><s%> to-tze-'ot and the goings out הַגְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul of the border יָֽמָּה׃ <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah. were at the sea

וּגְב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> u-ge-Vul border יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> Yam, And the west הַיָּ֥מָּה <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam-mah sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol [was] to the great וּגְב֑וּל <S%H1366><s%> u-ge-Vul; and the coast זֶ֠ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This גְּב֧וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul [thereof] This [is] the coast בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah סָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv round about לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam. according to their families

וּלְכָלֵ֣ב <S%H3612><s%> u-le-cha-Lev And unto Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּ֗ה <S%H3312><s%> ye-fun-Neh, of Jephunneh נָ֤תַן <S%H5414><s%> Na-tan he gave חֵ֙לֶק֙ <S%H2506><s%> che-lek a part בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch among בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- according פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> pi to the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לִֽיהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> li-ho-Shu-a'; to Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קִרְיַ֥ת kir-Yat אַרְבַּ֛ע <S%H7153><s%> 'ar-Ba' Kiriath-arba אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father הָעֲנָ֖ק <S%H6061><s%> ha-'a-Nak of Anak הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> hi which חֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H2275><s%> chev-Ron. which [city is] Hebron

וַיֹּ֤רֶשׁ <S%H3423><s%> vai-Yo-resh drove מִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham there כָּלֵ֔ב <S%H3612><s%> ka-Lev, And Caleb אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁלוֹשָׁ֖ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah thence the three בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei sons הָעֲנָ֑ק <S%H6061><s%> ha-'a-Nak; of Anak אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁשַׁ֤י <S%H8344><s%> she-Shai Sheshai וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֲחִימַן֙ <S%H289><s%> 'a-chi-Man and Ahiman וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et תַּלְמַ֔י <S%H8526><s%> tal-Mai, and Talmai יְלִידֵ֖י <S%H3211><s%> ye-li-Dei the children הָעֲנָֽק׃ <S%H6061><s%> ha-'a-Nak. of Anak

וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al And he went up מִשָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham, there אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei thence to the inhabitants דְּבִ֑ר <S%H1688><s%> de-Vir; of Debir וְשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> ve-shem- and the name דְּבִ֥ר <S%H1688><s%> de-Vir of Debir לְפָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nim before קִרְיַת־ kir-yat- סֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H7158><s%> Se-fer. [was] Kirjathsepher
